climatePledgeFriendly.details: Compact by Design (Certified by Amazon) products remove excess air and water, which reduces the carbon footprint of shipping and packaging.

features: Daily hygiene to help protect your gums and teeth and aid in the prevention of gum problems.
Those needing an effective rinse for gum problems (such as gingivitis, mouth sores, inflammation, bleeding gums and associated pain), bad breath, and dry mouth.

A safe, long-term use product for reducing chronic bad breath (halitosis). Hot and cold tooth sensitivity and tooth aches. Children, special needs individuals and others needing a product that’s safe to swallow.
Certified organic & all natural mouth rinse for healthy gums and teeth.
Gluten-free wheat grass & aloe vera, 20+ antioxidants & essential oils.
body.description: TRI-OLOGY Alcohol Free Restoring Rinse, using its patented synergistic union of powerful whole-plant nutrients, antioxidants, and essential oils, cleans and nourishes the entire mouth at the cellular level & restores balance to your oral pH. TRI-OLOGY’s micro-foaming action washes away odor-causing irritants, cleaning hard to reach areas brushing and flossing can’t reach. Published peer-reviewed independent studies have shown TRI-OLOGY Restoring Rinse is safe & effective for anyone seeking an alcohol free natural solution for mouth pain from mouth sores, tooth sensitivity, dry mouth, oral wounds, inflammation, bleeding/sensitive gums, adverse oral conditions associated with chemotherapy and auto immune disorders, & many more oral conditions. Whole-plant technology your body knows how to use Infected and/or damaged cells require nourishment for healing. The whole-plant nutrients in TRI-OLOGY are immediately recognized by your body’s cells to nourish and protect them. Polyphenols signal wound healing cells to repair oral tissues while protecting tissues from damaging free radical oxidation. Polyphenols in TRI-OLOGY protect teeth from decay, repair damaged tissues and aid in re-mineralization of tooth enamel. TRI-OLOGY is the #1 nutrient powered protective and oral wound care product used and recommended by dental professionals for over 10 years Ingredients: Distilled water, xylitol from organic hard wood, organic vegetable glycerin, 4% carbamide peroxide by volume, organic sweet almond oil, organic gluten-free whole leaf wheat grass powder, organic latex free inner-leaf aloe vera powder, organic peppermint oil, rosemary oil natural preservative, xanthan gum. WARNING: contains nut oil. Instructions: Shake well before each use. Supervise children using this product. Rinse with 2/3 of a capful (4ml) for 1 minute Do not eat or drink for 5 minutes Repeat twice a day and as needed TRI-OLOGY is NEVER tested on animals

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars TRIOLOGY Restoring Rinse
reviews.reviewText: Our dentist recommended this product for our son and he it has helped him tremendously

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This product is worth the money
reviews.reviewText: This product tastes pretty bad, unless you like the taste of grass. But the fact that it cleared my mouth of a nagging sore on my tongue due to the rubbing of some dental work within a couple of days makes the taste easy to deal with. My dentist highly recommended this product, and now I also highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars The product seems to be working.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It really works! :)
reviews.reviewText: This is amazing, it actually works! After trying humidifiers, mouth washes, rinses, lozenges, and every other trick in the book, this is the only thing I have found to actually keep my night time dry mouth at bay long enough to get a whole night's sleep. What a relief to finally find a product that does the trick!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like this mouth rinse. It is not strong and makes my mouth feel fresh and it doesn't make my mouth dry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Check Bottle size when ordering
reviews.reviewText: Forgot to check the bottle size when ordering - this comes in an 8 oz bottle instead of the more common 16 oz bottle. Bought this to try instead of the normal rinse used. Because the bottle was half the size the effective prices was twice what I normally pay

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I showed it to my dentist and he praised it.
reviews.reviewText: I've been having some gum recession for years and then I heard about this product. It has a mild "debriding" effect similar to peroxide but safer, tastes better and apparently effective according to my dental hygienist who says that my gum recession has not stopped but appears to be healing!I read an article about the bacteria involved in gum recession has also been found to be linked to the same bacteria found present in the brains of Alzheimer's patients!It's a bit pricey but what price do we put on our health. It only recommends 1/2 capful 3x/day. So a bottle lasts for 2 months easily. Now I use ALL of the Triology oral care products instead of toothpaste from the drugstore.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Makes things worse!!
reviews.reviewText: I used it once. The flavor wasn't great, but I thought it would be okay if it worked. It not only didn't work, it made my dry mouth worse! I ate a salted plum just to get some saliva going. I'm disappointed and frankly, annoyed! The one thing it claimed to do, it didn't. I've been using Biotene but thought this might even work better. Not! Hope I can return it. The bottle isn't sealed anymore and I will have to rely on the cap to keep it from spilling.
